import React, { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import ChatList from './ChatList' import { useSelector, } from "react-redux"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { userChats } from '../actions/chatActions'; export default function Chatbox() { const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("profile-LostAndFound")) const [chatList, setchatList] = useState(); useEffect(() => { getChatList() }, []) const getChatList =async()=>{ try { const chatListData=await userChats(user.data.result._id) setchatList(chatListData); } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } return ( <>
Your Chats
Aminos Co.
Active
{/* chatList */} { chatList.map((chats)=>{ })} {/* */}
{/* sender user */}
A
Hey How are you today?
{/* Loged in user */}
A
I'm ok what about you?
) }
